==Japanese==

===Etymology===
{{ja-kanjitab|み|ぜん|けい|yomi=o}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|未然|tr1=mizen|lit1=not yet occurred|形|tr2=kei|t2=form}}. Historically called {{ja-r|将然言|しょうぜんげん}}, {{ja-r|未然段|みぜんだん}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|みぜんけい|acc=h|acc_ref=DJR,NHK,SMK5|y=o}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|みぜんけい}}

# {{lb|ja|grammar|sort=みぜんけい}} a Japanese verbal inflectional category: the [[irrealis]] form
#: Indicates that something has not yet happened, or not yet begun.

====Related terms====
* {{ja-r|已然形|いぜんけい|gloss=[[realis]]}}
* {{ja-r|仮定形|かていけい|gloss=[[conditional]]}}
* {{ja-r|終止形|しゅうしけい|gloss=[[conclusive]]}}
* {{ja-r|命令形|めいれいけい|gloss=[[imperative]]}}
* {{ja-r|連用形|れんようけい|gloss=[[adverbial]]}}
* {{ja-r|連体形|れんたいけい|gloss=[[attributive]]}}
